attributes.action: Save Leicester's Braunstone Gate Bridge and Viaduct.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Aims to stop the destruction in Leicester (before april 2008) of the victorian braunstone gate railway bridge (last remaining example of a 'Bowstring' bridge), and the viaduct and arches behind the pump and tap pub and the poss. destruction of the pub itself. To make Leices. City Council and De Montfort University value the City's striking industrial historic architecture, and re use it wisely. To use the bridge as a cafe/gig/arts/Lecture Theatre/exhibition space, and restore it + viaduct for the sake of our architectural environment, community and future.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Leicester's Braunstone Gate Bridge and Viaduct."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15720.asp

Prime Minister's Office
